thread.title: Great Hotel Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Hotel Great Location - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Alanavfc
title: Great Hotel Great Location
text:
First time we have chosen an hotel in this area but after our recent stay at Rydges it won't be the last ! Upmarket area ,very safe good location for shops ,parks,restaurants, & pubs...plus tube station Gloucester Road on the door step.
The staff were so friendly and professional we shall certainly be returning ...thank you.
Alan & Tanya Lincs
